Both turned the saga in bold directions. Both are/were divisive when first released. I was speechless when The Last Jedi ended. The bittersweet taste in my mouth left me stunned. My childhood heroes came full circle and closed the arc. But\, that end scene filled me with hope. This film was about moving on\, healing\, and seeing hope when there is no reason to hope. Every main character learned a lesson\, every single one. It's okay to let go of the past to embrace the future. But\, what truly matters is the here and now. Be in the moment.
